mapper.select: select LECTURE_NO, LECTURE_RECORD, LECTURE_TITLE, LECTURE_CONTENT, LECTURE_FEE, MAXPEOPLE, ATTENDPEOPLE, LECTURE_DATE, LECTURE_TIME, LECTURE_STATUS, ID, BRANCH_NO, LECTURE_JOB, LECTURE_END, LECTURE_START, NAME, BRANCH_NAME from lecture join member using(id) join branch using(branch_no) where lecture_status='OPEN' order by lecture_Start desc
